amendment.description: An amendment numbered 36 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to ensure that campus faculty is trained to recognize victims of sexual or domestic violence.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Casten (IL) amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Casten (IL).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Casten (IL) amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
